thread.title: South Cobb High School student hit by car while crossing road
thread.title_full: South Cobb High School student hit by car while crossing road | www.ajc.com

author: Alexis Stevens
title: South Cobb High School student hit by car while crossing road
text:
A South Cobb High School student was hit by a vehicle as he tried to cross the street Tuesday morning, according to Cobb County police.
The 16-year-old boy, whose name was not released, was with another student when he was hit on Austell Road around 9:15 a.m., Sgt. Dana Pierce said.
The injured boy was taken to WellStar Kennestone Hospital, but his condition was not immediately known, Pierce said. The driver involved was not injured.
